Articles.Content: I just got my internet working and got the ksp demo! Now I want to have a go with wack a kerbal and toggle on infinite fuel while I learn how to launch. But no matter what I try I cant pull up the debug menu:( So after punching many diffrent key combinations into my windows vista keybord {yes I tried alt and F12} Iwas wondering if anyone knows how to use the debug menu in the demo.

If you are on a Mac the keyboard shortcut may be different.

http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Key_bindings
In that case, it sounds like the Debug console is only available in the full version of the game.
